name: Oaths of Orcus
description:
When you reach purgatory en route to oblivion, the Eye of the Veil interrupts your journey and offers you a way out, in exchange for your vision. Orcus, the punisher of broken oaths, plans to keep you in purgatory forever!

You cannot see whilst moving!
Esc to skip intro, WASD to move, Alt-F4 to close.
